divs: Sighting DetailsWas walking my dog in Leominster, Ma. Looking in the sky because of previous experiences, I saw a starlike ufo approximately 1,000 ft. In the air to the east of me traveling at a high rate of speed for about 5 seconds, then took off in about one second and dissappeared. When the ufo took off it looked like a comet or a shooting star and dissappeared. This happened at approximately 8:50pm to the east of Leominster Mass. And was heading north.
Summary: starlike ufo high rate of speed then took off like a comet and vanished
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Leominster
There were no other sightings in Leominster on or around September 10th 2011
